# Reference Materials

This document provides reference materials for the security workshop skill. It includes links to resources, best practices, and examples that can be used to enhance the learning experience for users.

## Resources

[GitHub Copilot SDK](https://github.com/github/copilot-sdk): A collection of tools and libraries for using copilot sdk in your projects.
[GitHub Copilot Documentation](https://docs.github.com/copilot): Official documentation for GitHub Copilot, including guides, tutorials, and API references.
[GitHub Security Best Practices](https://docs.github.com/en/code-security): A comprehensive guide to security best practices for GitHub repositories, including tips for securing your code and managing vulnerabilities.
[Copilot CLI](https://github.com/github/copilot-cli?locale=en-US): A command-line interface for GitHub Copilot, allowing you to interact with the Copilot SDK and manage your projects from the terminal.
[Custom agents](https://docs.github.com/en/copilot/how-tos/use-copilot-agents/coding-agent/create-custom-agents): A guide to creating custom agents, including examples and best practices for building effective agents.
[MCP Documentation](https://github.com/mcp): GitHub Official registry for the MCP (Model Context Protocol), including guides on how to use it effectively in your projects.
[Using agents in VSC](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/copilot/agents/overview): A guide to using agents in Visual Studio Code, including setup instructions and tips for maximizing productivity with agents.
